name: ai-business-automation-designer
description: AI-powered business automation designer with CrewAI

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:orchestrator" "npm run dev:workers"
scripts.build: npm run build:sdk && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:gateway
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install && cd ../../apps/gateway && npm install && cd ../../packages/sdk && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:gateway && npm run lint:sdk
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:gateway && npm run test:sdk
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:gateway && npm run clean:sdk
scripts.clean:sdk: cd packages/sdk && npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules
